_description: On oaths — one couplet translating ‘Lex et fama fies deuerencia caucio dampni / Defectus veri tibi dant iurare licenter’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Lawe an los & rich worchipe & of lore drede& defaute of
                    rith maket man to sueren in nede
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 20.
